data.text:
Mini game board visualization in table corner widget.

Add a small visual representation of the played tiles in the TableVisualization component (lower left corner). Doesn't need to be pixel-perfect accurate - just a rough visual of the domino chain to give players a sense of the board state at a glance.

**Location:** TableVisualization.tsx (lower left corner widget)
**Concept:** Small dots/rectangles showing approximate tile positions
**Priority:** Nice-to-have, improves game awareness
